Paul May

Goodbye Hackney

31 August 2013

An addendum to Everywhere I Have Ever Lived:

Having left New York in the Summer of 2013, we moved to London. Cliona looked for a new job while I continued to work on projects with Sloan-Kettering from a co-working space in Hackney Wick.

We sublet a cute little apartment fom Maria Zahle. It's our happy Hackney home for two months before Cliona finds a job in Oxford, and we opt to move up there.

I will miss Hackney quite a bit, but new adventures await.
